metadata.Title: CVE-2023-44487 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The HTTP/2 protocol allows a denial of service (server resourceconsumption) because request cancellation can reset many streams quickly,as exploited in the wild in August through October 2023.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-44487` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

haproxy - 2.6.15-1ubuntu2
vim-haproxy - 2.6.15-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

aspnetcore-runtime-6.0 - 6.0.123-0ubuntu1

criterions.comment: haproxy package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6.15-1ubuntu2').
